TopicTitle: How to get scattering in KSP

Articles.Content:
Hi guys some off you may be watching danny 2462, scott manley and Nexters lab and 

you may have noticed that even in 1.1 they have trees rocks and other stuff but how do you get that? Whell prepare to find out!

When you open ksp dont go into 'Start Game' click on settings then graphics. After that you should see a 'Scattering sign' off whell, turn it on and your done! Apply the settings and start playing your game like a pro!
